00034 /** @file module.h
00035     @brief Declaration of the Module class, which is the ispc-side representation
00036     of the results of compiling a source file.
00037  */
00038 
00039 #ifndef ISPC_MODULE_H
00040 #define ISPC_MODULE_H 1
00041 
00042 #include "ispc.h"
00043 
00044 class Module {
00045 public:
00046     /** The name of the source file being compiled should be passed as the
00047         module name. */
00048     Module(const char *filename);
00049 
00050     /** Compiles the source file passed to the Module constructor, adding
00051         its global variables and functions to both the llvm::Module and
00052         SymbolTable.  Returns the number of errors during compilation.  */
00053     int CompileFile();
00054 
00055     /** Adds the global variable described by the declaration information to
00056         the module. */
00057     void AddGlobal(DeclSpecs *ds, Declarator *decl);
00058 
00059     /** Adds the function described by the declaration information and the
00060         provided statements to the module. */
00061     void AddFunction(DeclSpecs *ds, Declarator *decl, Stmt *code);
00062 
00063     /** After a source file has been compiled, output can be generated in a
00064         number of different formats. */
00065     enum OutputType { Asm,      /** Generate text assembly language output */
00066                       Bitcode,  /** Generate LLVM IR bitcode output */
00067                       Object,   /** Generate a native object file */
00068                       Header    /** Generate a C/C++ header file with 
00069                                     declarations of 'export'ed functions, global
00070                                     variables, and the types used by them. */
00071     };
00072 
00073     /** Write the corresponding output type to the given file.  Returns
00074         true on success, false if there has been an error.  The given
00075         filename may be NULL, indicating that output should go to standard
00076         output. */
00077     bool WriteOutput(OutputType ot, const char *filename);
00078 
00079     /** Total number of errors encountered during compilation. */
00080     int errorCount;
00081 
00082     /** Symbol table to hold symbols visible in the current scope during
00083         compilation. */
00084     SymbolTable *symbolTable;
00085 
00086     /** llvm Module object into which globals and functions are added. */
00087     llvm::Module *module; 
00088 
00089 #ifndef LLVM_2_8
00090     /** The diBuilder manages generating debugging information (only
00091         supported in LLVM 2.9 and beyond...) */
00092     llvm::DIBuilder *diBuilder;
00093 #endif
00094 
00095     GatherBuffer *gatherBuffer;
00096 
00097 private:
00098     const char *filename;
00099 
00100     /** This member records the global variables that have been defined
00101         with 'extern' linkage, so that it's easy to include their
00102         declarations in generated header files.
00103 
00104         @todo FIXME: it would be nice to eliminate this and then query the
00105         symbol table or the llvm Module for them when/if we need them.
00106      */
00107     std::vector<Symbol *> externGlobals;
00108 
00109     bool writeHeader(const char *filename);
00110     bool writeObjectFileOrAssembly(OutputType outputType, const char *filename);
00111 };
00112 
00113 #endif // ISPC_MODULE_H
